name: The French Quarter Experience
description: Beginning by Nguyễn Dynasty concession to the French, the French quarter was a remarkable step towards urban development in Thang Long - Ha Noi. That was what my grandfather told me while we were walking hands in hands from our home to Trang Tien Ice-cream then up to the colonial palace. He told me the history and the story of his comrade in the winter of 1946. I would never forget all of that and I will tell you...
